Tks Steven, it's working with separate speakers, going really fast, I was  =

letting it run, and going through the TV channels just a few minutes ago, =

and  this cute little kids voice came in with, "Igor" it was on the list, =
so i 
turned  it on for them, I got them to say Igor again, i am trying to =

remember how to run  this video cam digital so i can show just how fast th=
is dial 
is going. and have  them talk. I couldn't get those little buttons=
 back in, 
and i couldn't get the  gray strap back on it either, I'll let y=
ou know when 
i can get down to a post  office to ship. tks.

age dated 6/4/2010 7:29:21 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,

ites:

x it, just
